summary: Dr. Marwan Wiggins, a physician, was reprimanded and his license suspended for a minimum of fifteen (15) months, retroactive to February 14, 2022. This action was taken after it was found that he diverted 93 vials of ketamine by falsifying patient medical records and was addicted to controlled dangerous substances. He is also required to enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP).
